snippet.title: Power Rangers: Battle for the Grid - Super Edition Official Trailer
snippet.description:
Welcome to the Super Edition of Power Rangers: Battle for the Grid! Featuring all of the game's DLC's released so far, as well as the newly announced Street Fighter Pack and some exclusive items too! This Super Edition of Battle for the Grid will release digitally on may 25th with a physical edition coming in July. Available on PS4, Nintendo Switch, Xbox One, and Stadia.

The Super Edition will contain: 
The base Power Rangers: Battle for the Grid game
Season One Pass 
Season Two Pass 
Season Three Pass
Street Fighter Pack
4 Bonus Character Skins
